attributes.action: Tax ready meals and fast food outlets , revenue to be paid to NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the government seems determined to stop people smoking and therefore reduce revenue available from this form of tax, shouldn't you consider taxing those who are too lazy, or addicted to 'fast food'. Obesity currently kills 5 times more people in the uk than smoking (BBC report) yet generates no additional taxation.
